attributes.action: Tax free haven in UK for green car manufactures and development
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Green car makers and developers should not pay tax, they are doing there but it help the enviroment and should be helped,  could create jobs if car manufactures come to Britain to develop green cars, Britain has no car manufaturing.  be the first goverment in the europe to help transport go green.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
